results.name: Triangle read by rows, A054533 * A127648 (matrix product).
link: Jinyuan Wang, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
formula: Triangle read by rows, A054533 * A127648 (matrix product). The operation is equivalent to taking termwise products of row A054533 terms and the natural numbers.
T(n, k) = k * Sum_{d|gcd(n,k)} d * mu(n/d) for n >= 1 and 1 <= k <= n. - _Petros Hadjicostas_, Jul 28 2019
